```pddl
[
  '(:action prepare ; Prepare an area or an entity for a task
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?entity - entity)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?entity) (not (prepared ?entity)))
    :effect (prepared ?entity)
  )',

  '(:action take ; Take an item from a source and update possession status
    :parameters (?item - object ?source - entity ?agent - agent)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?source) (not (in_possession ?agent ?item)) (is_part_of ?item ?source))
    :effect (and (in_possession ?agent ?item) (not (is_part_of ?item ?source)))
  )',

  '(:action dip ; Dip an item into a substance
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?substance - object)
    :precondition (and (has_item ?agent ?item) (at ?agent ?substance) (not (dipped ?item ?substance)))
    :effect (dipped ?item ?substance)
  )',

  '(:action plant ; Plant an entity at a location
    :parameters (?entity - object ?location - location ?agent - agent)
    :precondition (and (has_entity ?agent ?entity) (prepared ?location) (at ?agent ?location) (ready_to_plant ?entity))
    :effect (and (planted ?entity ?location) (not (has_entity ?agent ?entity)))
  )'
]
```
